docs.snippet: Through this remarkable chapter in the history of the United States and Iraq, we have met our responsibility. Now, it's time to turn the page.      PRESIDENT OBAMA, announcing an end to the American combat mission in Iraq. [A1]...
docs.lead_paragraph: Through this remarkable chapter in the history of the United States and Iraq, we have met our responsibility. Now, it's time to turn the page. PRESIDENT OBAMA, announcing an end to the American combat mission in Iraq. [A1]

docs.snippet: While this loss is raw and extraordinarily painful, we also know this: Those who stand up for justice are always on the right side of history.     PRESIDENT OBAMA, on Iranian demonstrators,  including a 26-year-old woman who was shot on  a Tehran ...
docs.lead_paragraph: While this loss is raw and extraordinarily painful, we also know this: Those who stand up for justice are always on the right side of history. PRESIDENT OBAMA, on Iranian demonstrators, including a 26-year-old woman who was shot on a Tehran street. [A1]

docs.snippet: Washington is all in a tizzy over who's at fault. Some say it's the Democrats' fault, the Republicans' fault. Listen, I'll take responsibility, I'm the president.PRESIDENT OBAMA, over executive bonuses at the American International Group. [A16]...
docs.lead_paragraph: Washington is all in a tizzy over who's at fault. Some say it's the Democrats' fault, the Republicans' fault. Listen, I'll take responsibility, I'm the president.PRESIDENT OBAMA, over executive bonuses at the American International Group. [A16]

docs.snippet: How do they justify this outrage to the taxpayers who are keeping the company afloat?      President Obama, reacting to the payment of millions of dollars in bonuses to executives of American International Group. [A1]...
docs.lead_paragraph: How do they justify this outrage to the taxpayers who are keeping the company afloat? President Obama, reacting to the payment of millions of dollars in bonuses to executives of American International Group. [A1]

docs.snippet: “[A]t the core of the American experience are a set of ideals that continue to stir our collective conscience . . .”...
docs.lead_paragraph: “[A]t the core of the American experience are a set of ideals that continue to stir our collective conscience . . .”

docs.snippet: At a certain point, I've just concluded that for me personally it is important for me to go ahead and affirm that I think same-sex couples should be able to get married.     PRESIDENT OBAMA,in an interview with ABC News. [A15]...
docs.lead_paragraph: At a certain point, I've just concluded that for me personally it is important for me to go ahead and affirm that I think same-sex couples should be able to get married. PRESIDENT OBAMA,in an interview with ABC News. [A15]

docs.snippet: We can't win the      future with a government of the past....
docs.lead_paragraph: We can't win the future with a government of the past.

docs.snippet: ''I think it's clear that  the article in which he and  his team appeared showed  poor judgment.''     PRESIDENT OBAMA,  on remarks made by  Gen. Stanley A. McChrystal,  his top commander in Afghanistan,  that were contemptuous  of senior administ...
docs.lead_paragraph: ''I think it's clear that the article in which he and his team appeared showed poor judgment.'' PRESIDENT OBAMA, on remarks made by Gen. Stanley A. McChrystal, his top commander in Afghanistan, that were contemptuous of senior administration officials. [A1]

docs.snippet: We must begin by  acknowledging the hard truth: We will not eradicate violent conflicts in our lifetimes. There will be times when nations -- acting individually or in concert -- will find the use of force not only  necessary but morally  justifie...
docs.lead_paragraph: We must begin by acknowledging the hard truth: We will not eradicate violent conflicts in our lifetimes. There will be times when nations -- acting individually or in concert -- will find the use of force not only necessary but morally justified. PRESIDENT OBAMA, accepting the Nobel Peace Prize. [A1]

docs.snippet: I think there have been times where I have said, 'I've got to step up my game in terms of talking to the American people about issues like health care.      PRESIDENT OBAMA, in an interview on ABC that was part of a media blitz on his health agend...
docs.lead_paragraph: I think there have been times where I have said, 'I've got to step up my game in terms of talking to the American people about issues like health care. PRESIDENT OBAMA, in an interview on ABC that was part of a media blitz on his health agenda. [A16]
